user_input:
Please create hourly Methane demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios.
Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format.
No need to access any PLEXOS database for now
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

function_args.user_input: Generate hourly Methane demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 for scenarios NT, NT_HE, and NT_LE for years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050. Split nodes as requested. Do not access any PLEXOS database.

tasks.description: Decompose annual Methane demand into hourly profiles for TYNDP 2026 for scenarios NT, NT_HE, NT_LE across years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050, ensuring nodes are split as requested.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', determine scenario identifiers (NT, NT_HE, NT_LE), years (2030, 2035, 2040, 2050), and the required node split definitions; produce intermediate hourly profile files per scenario-year-node.

tasks.description: Convert the generated hourly Methane demand profiles into TST-format workbooks for TYNDP 2026, preserving node splits and organizing outputs by scenario and year.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', collect outputs from 'main_demand_processer_v2' and format them into TST workbooks per scenario (NT, NT_HE, NT_LE) and year (2030, 2035, 2040, 2050).
